description.name: Outsourced staff while employed at P&A Grant Thornton
Supervised audit engagement teams to ensure that client’s set deadline is met.
Responsible for developing an audit plan, in coordination with the engagement manager or partner.

Also performed detailed work procedures such as overall analysis of the client’s business and its effects to its financial statements as well as detailed analysis on certain critical financial statement accounts of the client.
Designated as the country coordinator, facilitated monthly operation calls with the serviced market.
Responsible for the reporting of Business Unit Data, delivered Internal Accounting processes and maintained the accounting master data.
Ensured implementation and compliance of the agreed internal KPI and month-end closing timelines.
Reviewed adequacy of procedures performed and performed quality control reviews for audits performed in close coordination with engagement-in-charge and audit partner.
Discussed significant findings to client’s management and/or the Board for discussion of appropriate resolution of issues.
Executed administrative functions necessary for daily office operations, including staff performance deliberation.

company: Banco De Oro, Universal Bank, Inc.

description.name: Performs credit evaluation on client's credit and financial data and then prepares a report outlining client's credit worthiness for EXCOM/ CRECOM.
Works in close coordination with the Institutional Banking Group of the bank.
